state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled half of a bag of chips. -= Bedroom =- You arrive in a bedroom. A normal one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. You can make out a closed chest drawer. You see an antique trunk. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing. You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a king-size bed. The king-size bed is typical. But there isn't a thing on it.
